name: xEKEXOUSIAx Bag
description:
A fabric envelope made from raw, undyed, cotton. Each bag is fitted with two brass grommets and a length of leather cord. This allows for a never-ending variety of forms and expectations. 

The leather cord can be knotted at each end or tied together in order to create a strap or handle, or simply tied around the folded bag. This can be used as a clutch purse, but it is an envelope.

This is a bag made for radical reformations of lifestyle, it has no recommended use beyond your use.

Each label is hand inscribed with an individually block printed sigil.

Size (inches):
Bag: 14.5 x 10.5
Cord: 35

name: xPHARMAKONx Bag
description:
This is our first bag.

This is a bag for work of the home. It extends the influence of the home into the exterior world and redoubles the personal relevance of everyday tasks. As example, you buy grains at the market, using xPHARMAKONx instead of a plastic bag, and then wash said grains in said bag, before putting it to another use. 

With no formal closing apparatus, this bag is simply tied to secure or hang. 

This is a bag made for radical reformations of lifestyle, it has no recommended use beyond your use.

100% raw, undyed linen ; 10.5 x 4 x9.5

Care:
Linen is naturally tough and stain resistant. It takes well to hand washing with cold water and being line dried, but can also be machine washed on warm and tumbled dry.

Orders are shipped from Toronto, Canada
